name: Chicken Vs. Pigeon!
description:
1-2 player party game consisting of 3 mini-games! Battle it out as the brave chicken or pick the fearsome pigeon to soar to the finish line. Only one bird will bring home the gold!

This was a Game Jam game developed within 2 weeks! created by 2 developers. Would love any and all feedback :) Game was made with 2 player local play in mind but if your all alone and have no friends you can play by yourself against the AI.
